name: opendia-extension
description: Connect your browser to AI models

scripts.dev:chrome: npm run build:chrome && echo 'Load dist/chrome in Chrome'
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../opendia-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist/firefox && web-ext build --overwrite-dest
